mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.coathId AS "coathId", a.beginYearMonth AS "beginYearMonth", a.endYearMonth AS "endYearMonth", a.courseDate AS "courseDate", a.courseNum AS "courseNum", a.courseAddress AS "courseAddress", a.strInWeek AS "strInWeek", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.beginDate AS "beginDate", a.endDate AS "endDate", coach.nameCn AS "coachName"
LEFT JOIN sys_base_coach coach ON coach.id = a.coathId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ser_course( id, code, coathId, beginYearMonth, endYearMonth, courseDate, courseNum, courseAddress, strInWeek, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, beginDate, endDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{coathId}, #{beginYearMonth}, #{endYearMonth}, #{courseDate}, #{courseNum}, #{courseAddress}, #{strInWeek}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ser_course SET code = #{code}, coathId = #{coathId}, beginYearMonth = #{beginYearMonth}, endYearMonth = #{endYearMonth}, courseDate = #{courseDate}, courseNum = #{courseNum}, courseAddress = #{courseAddress}, strInWeek = #{strInWeek}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, beginDate = #{beginDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
